text: Sinful Davey is a 1969 British American adventure crime comedy movie directed by John Huston and starring John Hurt, Pamela Franklin, Anjelica Huston, Nigel Davenport, Ronald Fraser, Maxine Audley, Robert Morley, Fionnula Flanagan, Donal McCann, Allan Cuthbertson, Eddie Byrne and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * Category:1969 comedy movies Category:1969 crime movies Category:1969 adventure movies Category:British adventure movies Category:British criminal comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:Movies directed by John Huston
title: Sinful Davey
